extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression applySimplifier(Expression expression, Context context)
      We define this method to make this a functional interface again, so that simplifiers can be easily defined with lambda expressions.
      static Expression condition(Expression expression)
      Returns the condition of an if then else expression.
      static Expression copyWithReplacedCondition(Expression ifThenElse, Expression newCondition)
      Make a copy of a given if then else condition, but for a replaced condition, possibly simplifying it if new condition is true or false.
      static Expression elseBranch(Expression expression)
      Returns the else branch of an if then else expression.
      static Expression equivalentWithNonNegatedCondition(Expression expression)
      Receives an expression and, if it is an if then else, returns an equivalent one without top Not applications in the condition.
      static Expression flipBranchesWithThisCondition(Expression ifThenElse, Expression newCondition) 
      static Expression flipIfThenElseWithNegatedCondition(Expression ifThenElseWithNegatedCondition)

      static Expression make(Expression condition, Expression thenBranch, Expression elseBranch)
      Make an if then else expression, returning the then or else branches directly if condition is trivial, or the condition (or its negation) if the branches are trivial.
      static Expression make(Expression condition, Expression thenBranch, Expression elseBranch, boolean simplifyToConditionIfPossible)
      Make an if then else expression, returning the then or else branches directly if condition is trivial.
      static Expression make(Expression condition, int indexOfFirstBranch, Expression firstBranch, int indexOfSecondBranch, Expression secondBranch)
      Makes an if then else expression by receiving the branches but, instead of relying on the argument order to decide which branch is the then branch and which one is the else branch, receives their respective indices (they must be 1 and 2, or 2 and 1 -- index 0 is the index of the condition itself).
      static Expression makeBooleanFormulaEquivalentToIfThenElse(Expression ifThenElse) 
      static Expression makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression original, Expression newCondition, Expression newThenBranch, Expression newElseBranch)
      Same as makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression, Expression, Expression, Expression, boolean) with last argument equal to to true.
      static Expression makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression original, Expression newCondition, Expression newThenBranch, Expression newElseBranch, boolean simplifyToConditionIfPossible)
      Given an original if then else expression and a condition, then-branch and else-branch, makes and returns a new if then else expression with these components only if at least one of them is a different instance from the arguments of the original one, or returns the original otherwise.
      static Expression makeWithEqualityOrDisequalityConditionAndInvertedToEqualityIfNeeded(Expression equalityLiteral, Expression thenBranch, Expression elseBranch) 
      static Expression makeWithEqualityOrDisequalityConditionAndInvertedToEqualityIfNeeded(Expression equalityLiteral, Expression thenBranch, Expression elseBranch, boolean simplifyToConditionIfPossible) 
      static Expression makeWithoutConditionalCondition(Expression condition, Expression thenBranch, Expression elseBranch)
      Returns an expression equivalent to if booleanExpression then thenBranch else elseBranch, that is not an if-then-else expression with another if-then-else as condition (this could happen if booleanExpression is an if-then-else itself).
      static int oppositeBranchIndex(int branchIndex)
      Given an index of one of the branches of an if then else expression, returns the index of the other branch.
      static Expression simplify(Expression ifThenElse) 
      static Expression thenBranch(Expression expression)
      Returns the then branch of an if then else expression.

    • Method Detail

      • makeWithoutConditionalCondition

        public static Expression makeWithoutConditionalCondition(Expression condition,
                                                         Expression thenBranch,
                                                         Expression elseBranch)
        Returns an expression equivalent to if booleanExpression then thenBranch else elseBranch, that is not an if-then-else expression with another if-then-else as condition (this could happen if booleanExpression is an if-then-else itself). Note that if such nested if then else expressions occur in the then and else branches, they will not be modified.
        Parameters:
        condition -
        thenBranch -
        elseBranch -
        Returns:

      • makeIfDistinctFrom

        public static Expression makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression original,
                                            Expression newCondition,
                                            Expression newThenBranch,
                                            Expression newElseBranch)
        Same as makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression, Expression, Expression, Expression, boolean) with last argument equal to to true.

      • makeIfDistinctFrom

        public static Expression makeIfDistinctFrom(Expression original,
                                            Expression newCondition,
                                            Expression newThenBranch,
                                            Expression newElseBranch,
                                            boolean simplifyToConditionIfPossible)
        Given an original if then else expression and a condition, then-branch and else-branch, makes and returns a new if then else expression with these components only if at least one of them is a different instance from the arguments of the original one, or returns the original otherwise. This is useful if the arguments of the original expression have been through some potential transformation and we want to return a new if then else that is nonetheless guaranteed to be the same instance if no transformation actually took place.

      • make

        public static Expression make(Expression condition,
                              Expression thenBranch,
                              Expression elseBranch)
        Make an if then else expression, returning the then or else branches directly if condition is trivial, or the condition (or its negation) if the branches are trivial.

      • make

        public static Expression make(Expression condition,
                              Expression thenBranch,
                              Expression elseBranch,
                              boolean simplifyToConditionIfPossible)
        Make an if then else expression, returning the then or else branches directly if condition is trivial. Flag 'simplifyToConditionIfPossible' authorizes simplifications "if C then true else false -> C" to occur.

      • make

        public static Expression make(Expression condition,
                              int indexOfFirstBranch,
                              Expression firstBranch,
                              int indexOfSecondBranch,
                              Expression secondBranch)
        Makes an if then else expression by receiving the branches but, instead of relying on the argument order to decide which branch is the then branch and which one is the else branch, receives their respective indices (they must be 1 and 2, or 2 and 1 -- index 0 is the index of the condition itself).
